${ModID}:Clownfish.NAME: Clownfish
${ModID}:Clownfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Guppy.NAME: Guppy
${ModID}:Guppy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hammerhead.NAME: Hammerhead
${ModID}:Hammerhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Orca.NAME: Orca
${ModID}:Orca.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Orca.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Piranha.NAME: Piranha
${ModID}:Piranha.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Qwilfish.NAME: Qwilfish
${ModID}:Qwilfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SeaMonster.NAME: Sea Monster
${ModID}:SeaMonster.DESCRIPTION: Add 3 random Attacks into your hand. They cost 0 this turn and gain Exhaust. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:SeaMonster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 3 random Upgraded Attacks into your hand. They cost 0 this turn and gain Exhaust. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Shark.NAME: Shark
${ModID}:Shark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Siren.NAME: Siren
${ModID}:Siren.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! HP. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hook.NAME: Hook
${ModID}:Hook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:ReelItIn.NAME: Reel It In
${ModID}:ReelItIn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! ${ModID}:Fish to your hand.

${ModID}:BigHaul.NAME: Big Haul
${ModID}:BigHaul.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! ${ModID}:Fish to your hand and give them Retain.

${ModID}:BloodInTheWater.NAME: Blood in the Water
${ModID}:BloodInTheWater.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Gain  !${ModID}:m2! additional Strength for every ${ModID}:Fish ${ModID}:Consumed.
${ModID}:BloodInTheWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Strength. Gain  !${ModID}:m2! additional Strength for every ${ModID}:Fish ${ModID}:Consumed.

${ModID}:KingOfTheDepths.NAME: King of the Depths
${ModID}:KingOfTheDepths.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! ${ModID}:Fish to your draw pile. NL Whenever this card ${ModID}:Consumes a ${ModID}:Fish, permanently increase the ${ModID}:Fish added by !${ModID}:m2!.

${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.NAME: Catch of the Day
${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle a ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.
${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, shuffle a ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Baited.NAME: Baited
${ModID}:Baited.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a ${ModID}:Fish into your hand. NL If the enemy intends to attack, add !M! more.

${ModID}:GoneFishing.NAME: Gone Fishing
${ModID}:GoneFishing.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CarryOn.NAME: Carry On
${ModID}:CarryOn.DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 Cards. Draw an extra card next turn.
${ModID}:CarryOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 Cards. Draw 2 extra cards next turn.

${ModID}:FeedingFrenzy.NAME: Feeding Frenzy
${ModID}:FeedingFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all ${ModID}:Fish in your hand and draw pile. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each.

${ModID}:ItWasTHIIIIIIISBig.NAME: It Was THIIIIIIIS Big!
${ModID}:ItWasTHIIIIIIISBig.DESCRIPTION: Triple the effects of ALL current ${ModID}:Fish cards. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ItWasTHIIIIIIISBig.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Quadruple the effects of ALL current ${ModID}:Fish cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Approach.NAME: Approach
${ModID}:Approach.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Your next Attack deals double damage.

${ModID}:AsStone.NAME: As Stone
${ModID}:AsStone.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block this turn, gain !M! Thorns. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AllWillReturn.NAME: All Will Return
${ModID}:AllWillReturn.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block and deal damage equal to the Block you gained and damage you dealt last turn.

${ModID}:DiveBomb.NAME: Dive Bomb
${ModID}:DiveBomb.DESCRIPTION: Remove all ${ModID}:Flight. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each stack of ${ModID}:Flight removed.
${ModID}:DiveBomb.FLAVOR: Also known as the Angry Birds maneuver.

${ModID}:Hover.NAME: Hover
${ModID}:Hover.DESCRIPTION: Your ${ModID}:Flight can not decrease this turn.

${ModID}:CelestialCrafting.NAME: Celestial Crafting
${ModID}:CelestialCrafting.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Flight. NL While you are in ${ModID}:Flight, whenever you create a card, add a copy to your discard pile.
${ModID}:CelestialCrafting.FLAVOR: We have Master Reality at home.

${ModID}:Hunt.NAME: Hunt
${ModID}:Hunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Summon a ${ModID}:Hungry Fox that deals !M! damage.

${ModID}:RangersFocus.NAME: Ranger's Focus
${ModID}:RangersFocus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you play a ${ModID}:Summon card, NL gain [E].
${ModID}:RangersFocus.FLAVOR: If you summon an owl, you can call it Shoot and Hoot.

${ModID}:DistractingFox.NAME: Distracting Fox
${ModID}:DistractingFox.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Unsummon a fox.  If you do, at the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
${ModID}:DistractingFox.FLAVOR: This card used to be called Fur Armor, but then people didn't like it.

${ModID}:Pandamonium.NAME: Pandamonium
${ModID}:Pandamonium.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, ${ModID}:Summon a ${ModID}:Crazy Panda that deals !M! damage.

${ModID}:Frontflip.NAME: Frontflip
${ModID}:Frontflip.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! random cards from your discard pile.

${ModID}:GlassWave.NAME: Glass Wave
${ModID}:GlassWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Glass Armor. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:LightofCreation.NAME: Light of Creation
${ModID}:LightofCreation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for each card in your hand that didn't start in your deck.

${ModID}:QuickCast.NAME: Quick Cast
${ModID}:QuickCast.DESCRIPTION: Choose One ; Deal !D! damage and add a *Smite to your hand. NL Gain !B! Block and add a *Safety to your hand

${ModID}:ScorpionSting.NAME: Scorpion Sting
${ModID}:ScorpionSting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Apply 2 Weak

${ModID}:ShieldofLight.NAME: Shield of Light
${ModID}:ShieldofLight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and add a *Safety to your hand

${ModID}:BoomingBlade.NAME: Booming Blade
${ModID}:BoomingBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and add a *Smite to your hand.

${ModID}:Illusions.NAME: Illusions
${ModID}:Illusions.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:LoseWeight.NAME: Lose Weight
${ModID}:LoseWeight.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard any number of Colorless cards and gain 1 ${ModID}:Flight for each card discarded.

${ModID}:MirrorShot.NAME: Mirror Shot
${ModID}:MirrorShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you and the enemy share a buff or debuff with the same name, add !M! Shivs to your hand.

${ModID}:Soften.NAME: Soften
${ModID}:Soften.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:ChargeBeam.NAME: Charge Beam
${ModID}:ChargeBeam.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain. NL When Retained, increase its damage by !M! this combat. NL When discarded from your hand, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Gambit.NAME: Gambit
${ModID}:Gambit.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain !B! Block and discard 1 card at random.

${ModID}:Sparks.NAME: Sparks
${ModID}:Sparks.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies whenever you play an Attack.

${ModID}:StockUp.NAME: Stock Up
${ModID}:StockUp.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:EmergencyFireworks.NAME: Emergency Fireworks
${ModID}:EmergencyFireworks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL If discarded from hand, apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:LittleShieldDude.NAME: Little Shield Dude
${ModID}:LittleShieldDude.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack grants Block equal to their unblocked Damage.
${ModID}:LittleShieldDude.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your 2 next Attacks grant Block equal to their unblocked Damage.

${ModID}:ArcaneToolbox.NAME: Arcane Toolbox
${ModID}:ArcaneToolbox.DESCRIPTION: Your first card played each turn grants: NL 1 Strength if it's a Skill, 1 Dexterity if it's an Attack or [E] if it's a Power.
${ModID}:ArcaneToolbox.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your first card played each turn grants: NL 1 Strength if it's a Skill, 1 Dexterity if it's an Attack or [E] if it's a Power. NL Innate.

${ModID}:Hellblaze.NAME: Hellblaze
${ModID}:Hellblaze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL ${ModID}:Summon a ${ModID}:Fire Imp.

${ModID}:MischievousFox.NAME: Mischievous Fox
${ModID}:MischievousFox.DESCRIPTION: Summon a garticmod:MischievousFox that deals !M! damage.

${ModID}:ToothAndClaw.NAME: Tooth And Claw
${ModID}:ToothAndClaw.DESCRIPTION: garticmod:Unsummon a Summon. NL If you did, Summon a ${ModID}:Dire Wolf that deals 8 damage !M! times. NL Damage is affected by attack modifiers.

${ModID}:FriendlyLick.NAME: Friendly Lick
${ModID}:FriendlyLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Remove a random debuff from yourself.

${ModID}:GuzzlerHelmet.NAME: Guzzler Helmet
${ModID}:GuzzlerHelmet.DESCRIPTION: {@@}If there are more cards in your discard pile than your draw pile, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|-1,3=[E] [E] [E]|4=[E] [E] [E] [E]|5=[E] [E] [E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} .

${ModID}:LongShot.NAME: Long Shot
${ModID}:LongShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, discard any number of cards then draw that many.

${ModID}:ExtendoArm.NAME: Extendo Arm
${ModID}:ExtendoArm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw pile.

${ModID}:CreationOfPower.NAME: Creation of Power
${ModID}:CreationOfPower.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of each power you played this combat to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:CreationOfPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Upgraded copy of each power you played this combat to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PowerOfCreation.NAME: Power of Creation
${ModID}:PowerOfCreation.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of the first card you add to your hand each turn by 1.

${ModID}:Adaptation.NAME: Adaptation
${ModID}:Adaptation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stances, put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.
${ModID}:Adaptation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stances, put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:OpeningStrike.NAME: Opening Strike
${ModID}:OpeningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Draw a card.
${ModID}:OpeningStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Draw a card.

${ModID}:CleanestMind.NAME: Cleanest Mind
${ModID}:CleanestMind.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Max HP. NL At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and gain 1 Dexterity. NL At the end of your turn, if this is in your hand, shuffle a copy of it into your draw pile. NL Soulbound.

${ModID}:MultiBottleRockets.NAME: Multi-Bottle Rockets
${ModID}:MultiBottleRockets.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card discarded +!M!.

${ModID}:ScrapShield.NAME: Scrap Shield
${ModID}:ScrapShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Discard 1 card.

${ModID}:HeavySlam.NAME: Heavy Slam
${ModID}:HeavySlam.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your discard pile{!Upgrades!|>0=+3}.{!D!|>0= NL (Deals !D! damage.)}

${ModID}:GalaxyBrain.NAME: Galaxy Brain
${ModID}:GalaxyBrain.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL {@@}Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.{!D!|>0= NL (Deals !D! damage.)}
${ModID}:GalaxyBrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.{!D!|>0= NL (Deals !D! damage.)}

${ModID}:CutLosses.NAME: Cut Losses
${ModID}:CutLosses.DESCRIPTION: Exit your Stance. All enemies lose HP equal to the HP you lost this turn.
${ModID}:CutLosses.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL (You have lost !M! HP this turn.)

${ModID}:MentalMatrix.NAME: Mental Matrix
${ModID}:MentalMatrix.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Repeat for each card added to your draw or discard pile this turn.
${ModID}:MentalMatrix.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL (You have added !M! cards to your draw/discard pile this turn.)

${ModID}:Protector.NAME: Protector
${ModID}:Protector.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is discarded, gain [E].

${ModID}:CreationOfCreation.NAME: Creation of Creation
${ModID}:CreationOfCreation.DESCRIPTION: Randomly add Burning Blade, Distraction, White Noise or Jack of All Trades to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:CreationOfCreation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomly add Burning Blade+, Distraction+, White Noise+ or Jack of All Trades+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BlockAndLoad.NAME: Block and Load
${ModID}:BlockAndLoad.DESCRIPTION: Enter garticmod:Resolute. NL Whenever you gain Block this turn, add a random Attack to your hand.
${ModID}:BlockAndLoad.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter garticmod:Resolute. NL Whenever you gain Block this turn, add a random upgraded Attack to your hand.
